categories.name: Multiplayer
categories.description: Engage players with live multiplayer gameplay, fostering competition and cooperation.

modules.name: Lobbies
modules.description: Lobby & player management. Create & join lobbies instantly.

modules.name: Matchmaker
modules.description: Ticket-based matchmaking that balances skill, latency, and more. (Coming mid-2024)

modules.name: Parties
modules.description: Real-time player groups. Integrates with matchmaking. (Coming mid-2024)

modules.name: Presence
modules.description: Real-time online presence for players. See who's online and what they're doing.

categories.name: Authentication
categories.description: Secure and manage user accounts to personalize and safeguard the player experience.

modules.name: Auth Email
modules.description: [INTERNAL-ONLY: use auth_email_password/auth_email_passwordless/auth_email_link.] Authenticating users with email only or an email/password combination.

modules.name: Auth Email Linking
modules.description: Link emails to users.

modules.name: Auth Email Passwordless
modules.description: Authenticate users with only an email.

modules.name: Auth Email/Password
modules.description: Authenticate users with an email/password combination.

modules.name: Auth Username Password
modules.description: Authenticate users with a username/password combination.

modules.name: Identities
modules.description: Manage identities and identity data for users. Intended for internal use by modules exposing auth providers.

modules.name: User Password Verifier
modules.description: An INTERNAL-ONLY module to store and verify passwords by user ID. Used by some auth modules that require password verification.

modules.name: Social Authentication Provider
modules.description: Authenticate users with OAuth 2.0.

categories.name: Social
categories.description: Facilitate player interaction and community-building to boost engagement and retention.

modules.name: Friends
modules.description: Allow users to send and accept friend requests.

modules.name: Users
modules.description: Identify and manage users.

modules.name: Chat
modules.description: In-game player-to-player messaging. (Coming late-2024)

modules.name: Groups
modules.description: Group users in groups/clans/guilds. (Coming late-2024)

categories.name: Economy
categories.description: Drive player progression and monetization with virtual goods and currencies.

modules.name: Currency
modules.description: Track user balances and allow them to deposit and withdraw.

categories.name: Competitive
categories.description: Motivate and reward skilled play with rankings, tournaments, and leagues.

modules.name: Achievements
modules.description: Unlock and track user achievements. (Coming late-2024)

modules.name: Leaderboards
modules.description: Track and display top player rankings. (Coming mid-2024)

categories.name: Analytics
categories.description: Gain actionable insights to optimize game design, balance, and monetization.

modules.name: Analytics
modules.description: Track and visualize user behavior data. (Coming mid-2024)

categories.name: Security
categories.description: Protect your game and players from cheating, hacking, and disruptive behavior.

modules.name: Infisical
modules.description: All-in-one platform to securely manage application configuration and secrets across your team and infrastructure.

modules.name: Rate Limit
modules.description: Prevent abuse by limiting request rate.

modules.name: Tokens
modules.description: Create & verify tokens for authorization purposes.

categories.name: Utility
categories.description: Streamline development with foundational tools and reusable components.

modules.name: Email
modules.description: Send emails using multiple providers.

modules.name: Uploads
modules.description: Upload & store blobs of data.

modules.name: Game Saves
modules.description: Store and manage player progress data or world state. (Coming mid-2024)

categories.name: Platform
categories.description: Extend your game's reach and engage players across popular gaming platforms.

modules.name: Discord Activities
modules.description: Activities are a way to enjoy shared experiences with friends, such as games and media, on Discord itself.

modules.name: Epic Online Services
modules.description: Epic Online Services (EOS) is a cross-platform SDK that provides essential online services such as authentication, friends, matchmaking, and more for games.

modules.name: Steam
modules.description: Integrate with Steam accounts

modules.name: Twitch
modules.description: Integrate your game with drops

categories.name: Infrastructure
categories.description: Extend and integrate your game with custom backend services and third-party APIs.

modules.name: Rivet
modules.description: Open-source game servers & backend for multiplayer games.

categories.name: Service
categories.description: Integrate third-party services to enhance functionality and streamline operations.

modules.name: Twilio SendGrid
modules.description: Get your emails to the inbox—where they belong.

modules.name: IDEM
modules.description: Matchmaking for multi-player games – as an API. Be sure your game's matchmaking will be loved by players.
